title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Tuesday 4 August 2015 - BBC News
summary: danny beaumont has been found guilty of the murder of his friend steven smith .
the chief executive of northamptonshire cricket club has denied the club has asked the ecb for an emergency loan .
former mp brian binley says it would be `` very surprising '' is child abuse allegations against sir edward heath were true .
people living in little stanion fear facilities may never be completed after the developer went into administration .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on wednesday .

documents.title: have a good evening
text: thanks for joining us today .
we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 with all the latest news , sport , travel and weather for across northamptonshire .
today , we 've been talking about , among other things , the conviction of
author: Craig Lewis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : dry with clear spells tonight
text: tonight , there is a chance of an early shower , but it will be otherwise dry with clear spells .
brisk south-westerly winds will be easing down with lows of 15c ( 59f ) .
there will be a dry start tomorrow , with some sunny spells .
increasing cloud brings the chance of some showers in the afternoon , some of which could be thundery .
it will be less breezy with highs of 22c ( 71f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: fresh charges against murderer danny beaumont
text: murderer
after he was found guilty of killing his friend steven smith , new charges were put to him .
he was charged with possession of drugs - and pleaded guilty to three counts of possession of drugs with intent to supply .
he was remanded in custody today .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: daventry swimmer in national final
text: daventry dolphins
follow us tonight for emily sharps 50 fly final .
tweets will be posted closer to start .
@ daventrydc @ twitterid

documents.title: danny beaumont released from prison days before murder
text: danny beaumont , who was today found guilty of the murder of his friend steven smith , had only been released from prison days before he killed him .
he had been convicted for actual bodily harm and dangerous driving ; and had bitten a police officer who tried to arrest him .
out of prison on the tuesday , he murdered steven smith on the friday .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

olly stone took four wickets on a bright day in the field for the county , on the day off-field rumours of a ``

construction wo n't get underway until 2016 at the earliest .

text: the family of steven smith ,
in a statement they said they have been `` shattered and broken forever , '' but were grateful for the `` diligence '' of the jury and the compassion of northamptonshire police .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: saints players apologise to pub for behaviour
text: northampton saints players have returned to a pub in the town to

a northampton saints spokesman said some players were on a night out with friends and glasses were broken when a table fell over , but the players tidied up the glass and the pub was left in the same state as when they arrived .
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: supermarket plan for former irthlingborough shoe factory
text: a supermarket and houses could be built on the site of a
author: Northants Telegraph

documents.title: northants continue to dominate against kent
text: northamptonshire are continuing to pressurise kent on day one of their county championship match at canterbury .
a short while ago kent were 150-9 .
olly stone has three wickets for 54 runs in his 13 overs .
there 's ball by ball commentary available via the website - just click
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: statement from family of murdered rushden man
text: a statement has been read on behalf of the family of steven smith , after danny beaumont was found guilty of stabbing him to death in rushden last year .
it said : `` steven was such a generous and helpful person he would always put the needs of others ahead of himself .
his younger siblings still ask where he is on a daily basis , but all we can do is take them to the cemetery .
`` today , nine months since our lives were turned upside down , we have finally received justice for steven . ''
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: tributes paid to rushden businessman
text: the rotary club of rushden has paid tribute to one of the town 's best-known shopkeepers , jim osborne , who passed away last friday at kettering general hospital aged 83 .
jim founded osborne sports and toys in the high street in rushden in 1955 and it 's now in the hands of his son , william .

graham wise , from the club , said : `` i am sure somewhere in that 'land of make believe ' that jim helped to maintain , he will find a niche , perhaps running one of santa 's toyshops and i wonder if he will be able to transfer his personalised number plate ( j1 toy ) to his sleigh ? ''
author: Annabel Amos
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: saints players 'smashed glasses ' and 'urinated in garden '
text: a pub has received an apology after claims northampton saints rugby players smashed glasses , intimidated staff and urinated in a garden on a night out .
the
the club said it did not `` condone '' such behaviour , but claimed the incident had been `` blown out of proportion '' .
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: killer of steven smith told to expect life sentence
text: danny beaumont , who has been found guilty of the murdering steven smith in rushden last october , has been told by judge mayo at northampton crown court that `` there is only one sentence that i can pass - and that is life imprisonment ``
the minimum term of beaumont 's life sentence will be set in the next few weeks .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: part of a43 to become a dual carriageway
text: a 2.5km stretch of the a43 between northampton and kettering will become a dual carriageway , under plans
a new bypass will run between round spinney and the current sywell and holcot roundabout , to the east of the existing a43 and past a major new housing development .
its cost is yet to be confirmed , but funding will come from a range of sources including the developer behind the new homes .
author: Willy Gilder
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: beaumont pleads guilty to drugs charges
text: after being found guilty of murdering steven smith in rushden last october , danny beaumount has pleaded guilty to three counts of possession of drugs with intent to supply .
sentencing will be postponed .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: danny beaumont murder trial guilty verdict
text: a jury has found danny beaumont guilty of murdering steven smith by a majority of 10 to 2 .
mr smith ( was stabbed to death at his home in rushden last october .
he had been stabbed in the chest and the back .
danny beaumont said he acted in self defence .
the jury at northampton crown court reached its decision after more than two days of deliberation .
beaumont will be sentenced at a later date .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: breakingverdict in danny beaumont trial
text: danny beaumont has been found guilty by a jury at northampton crown court of the murder of steven smith .
more to follow
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: corby 's parks win national award - again !
text: corby borough council
corby 's woodland has been given green flag status for 4th year running .

documents.title: northamptonshire on top in the cricket
text: northamptonshire have made a cracking start to their county championship match against kent at canterbury .
at lunch on day one , kent are 66/4 with maurice chambers taking two wickets for 13 runs in six overs .
you can get ball-by-ball commentary via the
author: Alex Winter

documents.title: teen shot with air gun fired by car passenger
text: a 16-year-old boy was hit in the leg by an air gun pellet fired from a passing car .
the victim , who suffered a minor injury to his lower leg , had been standing near the jubilee avenue/gainsborough road roundabout on friday evening .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: disabled people made to feel 'like children '
text: i 've been hearing how disabled people in northamptonshire are continuing to feel belittled and marginalised , as the charity scope launches a new campaign

scope says four out of 10 disabled people in the east midlands say they 've been asked what 's wrong with them by a stranger - and the same number say they 've been accused of not actually having a disability at all .
author: Willy Gilder
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: weather : cloudy , but dry
text: it 's not going to be as warm or sunny as it was yesterday and the cloud will increase through the afternoon .
it 'll be quite breezy too , especially over higher ground - 18c ( 64f ) the high .
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
Presenter, BBC Weather

documents.title: danny beaumont murder trial : judge asks for majority verdict
text: i 'm at northampton crown court , where the judge in the danny beaumont murder trial has just told the jury he 'll accept a majority verdict .
mr beaumont , 27 , is accused of stabbing 23-year-old steven smith to death last october .
he denies the charges , claiming he was acting in self-defence .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: new bbc training scheme for northants youngsters
text: if you are aged between 16-24 and unemployed , or know someone who is , the bbc wants to hear from you .
it 's teaming up with colleges on a new
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: corby mp calls for little stanion summit
text: developers , administrators , councils and residents all need to get around the same table if the half-finished village of little stanion is to be finished .
building work stopped there in 2012 and corby mp tom pursglove , says he wants more details from the administrator about where
author: Stuart Linnell
Presenter, BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: new northampton in bloom
text: northampton borough council
more great added to northampton in bloom gallery - here 's a few that caught our eye

documents.title: graeme swann : 'in 20 years we will have nine or ten clubs '
text: former northamptonshire and england spinner graeme swann has told the bbc he is `` shocked '' by

swann said : `` i think inevitably in 20 years time we will only have nine or ten clubs whether that means amalgamation with neighbouring counties or some clubs going bust inevitably it 's unsustainable , the model we have at the moment . ''
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: second 50 over win in as many days for northamptonshire
text: rising england all-rounder
it was the second win in as many days for the county , following their
author: Alex Winter

text: northampton saints players have
author: Northampton Chronicle & Echo

documents.title: police forces and universities to work together
text: northamptonshire police and the university of northampton will take part in a project looking at how the latest academic research on crime could help police forces to do their jobs better .
the east midlands policing academic collaboration covers forces and academic institutions in northants , leicestershire , nottinghamshire and lincolnshire .
it 's been given £ 862,620 to fund closer ties between academics and police officers and to carry out research .
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northants cricket chief exec : 'it 's not do or die '
text: the chief executive of northamptonshire cricket club , ray payne , has
mr payne said the club is in the first year of a three year plan to make it more sustainable .
last year it declared a £ 305,636 loss .
he said : `` it 's not an emergency loan , it 's about longer-term cash-flow and ensuring the losses reported last year are not reported this year . ''
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton in bottom six for sporting atmosphere
text: the sporting atmosphere and culture of northampton is in the bottom six of 48 towns and cities nationally , according to a survey of 5,000 fans by broadcaster espn .
but kevin shoemake , who chairs the northamptonshire football association , said : `` i 've read this report from top to bottom some of the scores are very subjective .
right down to grass roots level it 's tough times , but participation levels are very , very good . ''
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: the news so far
text: here 's what we 've been talking about this morning
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: spirit of corby deadline looms
text: nominations for the
the annual event recognises people that go above and beyond in fields like education , the community and environment .
the deadline is 17:00 on monday , 24 august .
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: tributes to osborne 's sports and toys founder
text: hundreds of people have commented online following the
author: Northants Telegraph

documents.title: former mp says edward heath allegations are 'gossip '
text: retired former northampton south mp , brian binley , says child abuse allegations against former prime minister , sir edward heath , are the equivalent of `` the two women over the garden fence '' .
the police watchdog is to investigate whether
mr binley , who worked with the former conservative leader in the 1960s , said : `` i 'd find it remarkable if this were proved to be true . ''
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: developers should have given little stanion bonds
text: people living in the half-finished village of
the original developer went into administration in 2012 .
play areas , a community centre and a shop have n't materialised and residents say £ 2m earmarked for community facilities is missing .
the administrator says the money was paid out for a `` proper purpose '' .
natasha douglas , from little stanion , said : `` surely these developers should be being asked for bonds to be put up before they 're allowed to build houses . ''
author: Stuart Linnell
Presenter, BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton 's sporting atmosphere 'second to none '
text: a survey for broadcaster espn puts northampton in the bottom six of 48 towns and cities for sporting atmosphere - and i find it quite amazing .
even though the clubs have a very active community programme already , they should take note of this report and get out there even more , such as in our town centres .
publicise themselves .
but we have a great sporting atmosphere and we are a centre of excellence for a wide range of sports .
we should recognise that .
author: Lennie Newman
Saints summariser, BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northants cricket club : 'we 're not moving '
text: the chief executive of northamptonshire cricket club , ray payne , has been defending the county side following an
mr payne said : `` we are certainly not moving grounds .
i 'm not sure where that idea has come from .
we have invested a lot of money over the last few years in the ground .
the future of the club is very firmly at wantage road . ''
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: northants cricket club denies seeking emergency loan
text: northamptonshire cricket club 's chief executive says his club has asked the ecb for assistance , but denies seeking an emergency loan from the governing body .
payne was responding to claims made on the cricinfo website yesterday , that the club needs half a million pounds to meet
payne says they are one of a number of clubs asking the ecb what support `` may be available '' for first class county cricket .
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: weather : cooler and cloudier
text: it 'll be a bright start , but high cloud will roll in from the west .
although a few showers are possible , it 'll be dry in most places with some bright or sunny spells .
breezy , particularly over arbury hill .
maximum temperature : 19c ( 66f )
you can see a full forecast on the bbc look east
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
Presenter, BBC Weather

documents.title: morning
text: hello and welcome to local live for northamptonshire .
from now until 18:00 we 'll bring you the latest news , sport and travel from across the county .
we want to hear from you , so if you 've got something you 'd like to share then you can
